column4: How can i install GCC witthout having MAKE installed? Cuz i need MAKE to install GCC and vice versa :O
will that work without having nor gcc nor make nor nothing (i have apt-get) installed?
yes, thats the *usual* way to get those things
thanks! it will be very useful :) my friend bought a sheevaplug PC and that bring a Debian for AMR processors that has nothing installed on it
singular of "not plural" lol, sorry, my bad english xD Thanks
damn, i dont have wget installed LOL
is this ubuntu or something else?
i have it running on this: http://www.cyrius.com/debian/kirkwood/sheevaplug/gallery.html
hmm not sure. maybe want to try a debian channel?
i would think if you have apt-get you'd have some way for it to download things, such as wget..
apt-get asks me for wget LOL
ive never used the arm build of debian. i suggest #debian
yes, im gonna ask there, thanks, as soon as i get wget ill be able to install build-essential :)
